name: Moissa Knight, the Comet General
effectText: When you draw this card: You can reveal it; during your Main Phase this turn, you can conduct 1 Pendulum Summon of a monster(s) from your hand in addition to your Pendulum Summon. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
pendEffect: If you Pendulum Summon a monster(s): Place this card on either the top or bottom of the Deck.
